title: ü¶Å ONLINE FEEDBACK PORTAL ü¶Å
content:
Hi Everyone!

After listening to the suggestions we have received from all of you, we have decided to come up with an online anonymous feedback portal! This portal is set up to help us understand the problems and the complaints that might be going around, or help out any of you that might be facing challenges that you are scared to bring up in person.

Feel free to make public posts if you are up for a discussion, or privately send in your complaint/feedback. We hope to reach out and listen to all of you through this channel!

https://sayat.me/HouseOfLeo
